resources.string: This is a ListActivity with custom content view. It contains this header, ListView and a footer. ListView reads and displays all contacts. ListView also filters contacts using the search view in the Actionbar. List activity uses Loaders to load data asynchronously. This activity can handle device rotation. This activity also uses a progress bar to indicate data is being loaded.
This is the footer for the custom content view. Although headers and footers can be done through a list view this sample uses explicit text views.
